info.description: The Admin 'Masu' API for Cost Management.  You can find out more about     Cost Management at [https://github.com/project-koku/](https://github.com/project-koku/).
info.title: Cost Management Admin

tags.name: Enabled Tags
tags.description: Create or delete enabled tags for a provider type

tags.name: Update Cost Model Cost
tags.description: Operations about updating cost model costs

tags.name: Additional Context

get.summary: Download reports
get.description: Return download file async task ID.

200.description: The celery task ID of the download task

parameters.name: provider_uuid
parameters.description: The provider UUID

parameters.name: bill_date
parameters.description: The month's data to download

parameters.name: summarize_reports
parameters.description: Whether to trigger summarization after the download and process.

parameters.name: schema
parameters.description: The database schema

parameters.name: provider_type
parameters.description: The provider type

200.description: List of tag keys

200.description: List of tag keys

get.description: Return simulated expired data.

200.description: Simulate the deletion expired data

get.description: Collect HCS report data.

parameters.name: provider_uuid
parameters.description: The provider UUID

parameters.name: provider_type
parameters.description: The provider type

parameters.name: schema_name
parameters.description: The database schema_name

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: The date to begin summarizing

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: The date to end summarizing

200.description: HCS report task has been queued

get.description: Finalize HCS report data.

parameters.name: month
parameters.description: The month you want to finalize

parameters.name: year
parameters.description: The year you want to finalize, you must provide month when using this option

parameters.name: provider_uuid
parameters.description: The provider UUID (not supported with provider_type or schema_name)

parameters.name: provider_type
parameters.description: The provider type (not supported with provider_uuid)

parameters.name: schema_name
parameters.description: The database schema (not supported with provider_uuid)

parameters.name: tracing_id
parameters.description: The tracing UUID

200.description: HCS Finalization task has been queued

get.description: Update report summary tables in the database.

parameters.description: The provider UUID

parameters.description: The date to begin summarizing

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: The date to end summarizing

parameters.name: ocp_on_cloud
parameters.description: Whether to summarize OCP on Cloud as well.

parameters.description: Whether to summarize OCP on Cloud as well.

get.summary: List the sources

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the source to filter for.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of source to filter for.

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: The account id to filter on.

parameters.name: org_id
parameters.description: The org id to filter on.

parameters.name: schema_name
parameters.description: The account id to filter on.

parameters.name: infrastructure_provider_id
parameters.description: The source UUID of the underlying cloud account an OpenShift cluster is operating on.

parameters.name: cluster_id
parameters.description: The cluster ID of an OpenShift cluster.

parameters.name: active
parameters.description: Whether to filter for active sources.

parameters.name: paused
parameters.description: Whether to filter for paused sources.

parameters.name: pending_delete
parameters.description: Whether to filter for pending_delete sources.

parameters.name: pending_update
parameters.description: Whether to filter for pending_update sources.

parameters.name: out_of_order_delete
parameters.description: Whether to filter for out_of_order_delete sources.

200.description: A paginated list of source objects

get.summary: Get a source

parameters.name: source_id
parameters.description: ID of source to get

200.description: A Source object

parameters.description: ID of source to patch

get.summary: Returns a list of running celery tasks.
get.description: Returns a list of running celery tasks.

200.description: Returns a list of running celery tasks.

get.summary: Returns a list of celery queues with the number of tasks in them.
get.description: Returns a dictionary of queues with queue length.

200.description: Returns a dictionary of queues with their associated lengths.

get.summary: Returns the number of tasks cleared the celery queues.
get.description: Returns the number of tasks cleared the celery queues.

parameters.name: clear_all
parameters.description: whether to clear all celery queues.

200.description: Returns the number of tasks cleared the celery queue.

get.summary: Returns a table showing the PostgreSQL database software version.
get.description: Returns a HTML document showing the database version.

200.description: Returns a HTML document showing the database version.

get.summary: Returns a table showing the PostgreSQL database software version.
get.description: Returns a HTML document showing the database software settings.

200.description: Returns a HTML document showing the database software settings.

get.summary: Returns a table showing query statement statistics if the pg_stat_statements extension has been installed.
get.description: Returns a HTML document showing query statement statistics if the pg_stat_statements extension has been installed.

parameters.name: dbname
parameters.description: Specify a database in the cluster. Default is the application DB

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit of the returned result set. Default is 100

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset into the query result set before returning records

200.description: Returns a HTML document showing query statement statistics if the pg_stat_statements extension has been installed.

get.summary: Returns a table showing current connection activity.
get.description: Returns a HTML document showing current connection activity.

parameters.name: dbname
parameters.description: Specify a database in the cluster. Default is the application DB

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit of the returned result set. The default is 100.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset into the query result set before returning records. The default is no offset.

parameters.name: pid
parameters.description: Narrow results to supplied pid values

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: Narrow results to supplied state values. These include: active, idle, idle in transaction

200.description: Returns a HTML document showing current connection activity.

get.summary: Returns a table showing any detected blocking locks.
get.description: Returns a HTML document showing any blocking locks and processes that are blocked by them.

parameters.name: dbname
parameters.description: Specify a database in the cluster. Default is the application DB

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit of the returned result set. Default is 100

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset into the query result set before returning records

200.description: Returns a HTML document showing any blocking locks and processes that are blocked by them.

get.summary: Return a table listing dtabase schemata and the assiciated storage size.
get.description: Returns a HTML document showing schema sizes.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit of the returned result set. The default is 500.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset into the query result set before returning records. The default is no offset.

parameters.name: top
parameters.description: Also include top n tables by storage size (if > 0). Default is zero

200.description: Returns a HTML document showing current connection activity.

get.summary: Returns a HTML document interface to submit a query for the database to explain.
get.description: Returns a HTML document interface to submit a query for the database to explain.

200.description: Returns a HTML document interface to submit a query for the database to explain.

post.summary: Returns JSON containing each query and explanation submitted.
post.description: Returns JSON containing each query and explanation submitted.

parameters.name: sql_statement
parameters.description: The text of the SQL statement to explain.

schema.example: select col from table where filter = 'value';

200.description: Return Plans.

get.summary: Returns dictionary with cost mappings for continuity checks
get.description: Returns a dictionary with cost mappings for continuity checks

parameters.name: provider_uuid
parameters.description: The provider UUID

parameters.name: daily
parameters.description: boolean flag to return daily breakdown

200.description: Returns a dictionary with cost mappings for continuity checks

get.summary: Update exchange rates
get.description: Update and return list of exchange rates

200.description: Returns a dictionary of exchange rates after update

get.summary: Returns all manifest information

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: The account id to filter on.

parameters.name: org_id
parameters.description: The org id to filter on.

parameters.name: schema_name
parameters.description: The schema_name to filter on.

parameters.name: provider
parameters.description: The provider_uuid to filter on.

parameters.name: created_before
parameters.description: The iso8601 date to find manifests created before.

parameters.name: created_after
parameters.description: The iso8601 date to find manifests created after.

parameters.name: completed_before
parameters.description: The iso8601 date to find manifests created before.

parameters.name: completed_after
parameters.description: The iso8601 date to find manifests created after.

parameters.name: failed
parameters.description: Filter on manifests that failed processing.

parameters.name: running
parameters.description: Filter on manifests that are actively running tasks.

200.description: An object describing manifest information

get.summary: returns manifest for a given manifest ID

parameters.name: manifest_id
parameters.description: manifest id

200.description: An object describing manifest information

get.summary: returns status reports for a given manifest ID

parameters.name: manifest_id
parameters.description: manifest id

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter status reports by status state

parameters.name: celery_task_id
parameters.description: Filter status reports by celery task ID

parameters.name: failed_status
parameters.description: Filter status reports by failed status state

200.description: An object describing manifest information

post.summary: Returns JSON or CSV with query output.
post.description: Returns JSON or CSV with query output.

200.description: Query result.

get.summary: Returns JSON with query output.
get.description: Returns JSON with query output.

parameters.name: api_service
parameters.description: name of the trino ui api to call

200.description: JSON with query result.

get.summary: Returns dictionary with task ids as keys and paths as values

parameters.description: The provider UUID

parameters.name: schema
parameters.description: schema

parameters.name: bill_date
parameters.description: The month's data to download

parameters.name: ignore_manifest
parameters.description: will not delete manifests if param is present

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: start of when you want the files purged

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: end of when you want the files purged

200.description: Returns a dictionary with cost mappings for continuity checks

sql_statement.example: select col from table where filter = 'value';

example.Error: Unable to establish connection with broker.

type.description: A computer-readable identifier of the error type.

loc.description: The error's location as a list.

msg.description: A human-readable explanation of the error.

ctx.description: An optional object which contains values required to render the error message.

url.description: The URL to further information about the error.
